properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ FROM
F/V PATRICIA MARTA IN 48-15.00N 010-58.13W.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
MRCC FALMOUTH, PHONE: 44 1326 317575,
FAX: 44 1326 315610,
E-MAIL: FALMOUTHCOASTGUARD@MCGA.GOV.UK.
